description:
When will the penny drop?
How long till this all stops?
What's it gonna have to take?
For the world to retaliate...
The sound of silence screams so loud
As the elephant in the room floats like a heavy cloud
Brothers & sisters weak at the knees
Trembling at the thought of this so called ""deadly"" disease 
No questions asked or do they wish to sieze 
The distortion and lies of the ""Trusted Expertees"" 
As the days go by, we sit knod and agree
Making up excuses, sweeping up their debris... 
Nothing but a machine, infected by the mainstream 
All we hear is fake news & aparent ""new cases""
Compromised PCR tests and now we have to cover up our faces!?!?
What about the suicides & mental health? 
Is this really about a virus?
I smell control, power and wealth 
And so they call for mandatory?
Sorry! but there are way too many holes in this covid cover up story 
How far will it go? this unlawful joke
How much of the evasion are we willing to soak?
Living on drip feed, living in false hope. 
Dictatorship lurking right around the corner 
Bang on time for the New World Order...
Oops excuse me, I mean new normal 
Cashless society & face recognition 
Don't we find this a little suspicious?
When will the penny drop?
When will this all stop?
I pray for those who aren't prepared to see
For they are far and lost at See
.
I stand for you from a place of love 
.
.
.
.
#love #questions #questioneverything #humanityfirst #silence #idonotconsent #standupandfight #standupforyourrights #covid19 #plandemic2020 #riseup #wiseup #togetherwestand #togetherweareone
